articles.author: Prithi Narayanan
articles.title: ‘Wanted to get my daughters involved too in the moment. They went, ‘Did we win?’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Sydney Test hero Ravichandran Ashwin's wife shares the experience of watching the final day's play from her hotel room, along with their two daughters.
articles.content:
Aadhya, my four-and-a-half-year-old daughter, was particularly nosy that morning. She had seen Ashwin writhing in pain and piped up Put leave, appa!
Why go to the office in pain, when you can chill … [+8302 chars]
